TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PeerCollaborationPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PeerCollaborationPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class PeerCollaborationPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type PeerCollaborationPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Specifies the values that define or are used in object permissions.

span.span: Specifies the values that define or are used in object permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值允許所有本機和內部網路區域應用程式存取協同作業服務，並且沒有權限授與網際網路區域應用程式。The default allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access collaboration services, and no permission is granted for Internet zone applications. 換句話說，如果預設沒有權限已變更，所有連結本機以及網站本機應用程式能夠存取對等共同作業服務，但全域應用程式沒有存取權。In other words, if the default permissions are not changed, all link-local and site-local applications have access to Peer-To-Peer collaboration services, but global applications have no access. 這個類別不是可衍生出。This class is not derivable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型的執行個體已沒有存取權的權限所保護的資源，或它們不受限制的完整存取這些資源。Instances of this type either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources. 如果狀態為、執行個體傳遞所有的要求。If state is , the instance passes all demands. 如果狀態包含任何其他值：執行個體失敗的所有要求。If state contains any other value, the instance fails all demands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份執行個體授與存取相同資源與原始的權限。A copy of a instance grants the same access to resources as the original permission.

summary.span: Represents the XML object model for encoding security objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別被要簡單的 XML 物件模型用於安全性系統，而不做為一般的 XML 物件模型的輕量型實作。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the security system, and not for use as a general XML object model. 這個類別無法被繼承。This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: This new permission is a reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

span.span: This new permission is a reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 下列陳述式必須是`true`為所有實作方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the method. X 和 Y 代表物件參考未`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent object references that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Intersect(X) 傳回的值等於 X。X.Intersect(X) returns a value equal to X. - X.Intersect(Y) 傳回 Y.Intersect(X) 相同的值。X.Intersect(Y) returns the same value as Y.Intersect(X). - X.Intersect (`null`參考) 傳回`null`參考。X.Intersect(a `null` reference) returns a `null` reference.

exception.span: The target parameter is not a reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

span.span: The target parameter is not a reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsSubsetOf (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
public: override bool IsSubsetOf(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool override this.IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool

param.name: target
param.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前是所指定權限的子集，如果目前權限會指定一組作業所指定的權限全部包含。The current is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，代表存取權限 」*C:\example.txt*「 」 表示存取權的權限的子集*c:\\*"。For example, a permission that represents access to "*C:\example.txt*" is a subset of a permission that represents access to "*C:\\*". 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 下列陳述式必須是`true`為所有實作方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the method. X、 Y 和 Z 代表不是物件`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X, Y, and Z represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - 傳回 X.IsSubsetOf(X) `true`。X.IsSubsetOf(X) returns `true`. - X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 傳回 Y.IsSubsetOf(X) 相同的值，如果且只有 X 和 Y 代表相同的權限集。X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns the same value as Y.IsSubsetOf(X) if and only if X and Y represent the same set of permissions. - 如果兩者都傳回 X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 和 Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) `true`，X.IsSubsetOf(Z) 傳回`true`。If X.IsSubsetOf(Y) and Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) both return `true`, X.IsSubsetOf(Z) returns `true`. 如果 X 代表空[IPermission](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98303)權限的無狀態的物件和 Y 代表 IPermission 物件`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 傳回`true`。If X represents an empty [IPermission](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98303) object with a permission state of None and Y represents an IPermission object that is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns `true`. 如果 Z 也是空白的使用權限，複合設定 X.Union(Z) 作業。IsSubsetOf(Y) 也會傳回`true`因為的兩個空的權限是空的權限。If Z is also an empty permission, the compound set operation X.Union(Z).IsSubsetOf(Y) also returns `true` because the of two empty permissions is an empty permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，權限類別方法會由基礎結構，但不適合用於應用程式。In general, permission class methods are used by the infrastructure and are not intended for use in applications.

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

summary.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the of the current and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the of the current and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表由目前的所有作業的權限及指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 下列陳述式必須是`true`為所有實作的聯集的方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the Union method. X 和 Y 代表不是物件`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Union(X) 傳回具有相同的 X 值的物件。X.Union(X) returns an object that has the same value as X. - X.Union(Y) 傳回的物件具有 Y.Union(X) 所傳回的物件相同的值。X.Union(Y) returns an object that has the same value as the object returned by Y.Union(X). - X.Union (`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)) 會傳回具有相同的 X 值的物件。X.Union(a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)) returns an object that has the same value as X.
